# In the Wake - Cruise Planning Logbook
> Planning tools, travel tips, and faith-scented reflections for smoother sailings

## Overview
In the Wake is a comprehensive cruise planning resource specializing in Royal Caribbean cruises, with expanding coverage of Holland America, MSC, and other major cruise lines. The site provides interactive planning tools, detailed ship information, restaurant menus, accessibility resources, and solo travel guidance—all written from real voyage experience.

## Primary Focus
- Royal Caribbean International (primary expertise)
- Practical planning tools and calculators
- Accessibility and disability resources
- Solo cruising guidance
- Faith-integrated travel perspective

## Key Interactive Tools

### Drink Package Calculator
URL: /drink-calculator.html
Description: Break-even calculator for Royal Caribbean drink packages (Soda, Refreshment, Deluxe, Coffee Card). Features multi-currency support (USD, GBP, EUR, CAD, AUD), Crown & Anchor loyalty voucher tracking, sea/port day weighting, and group calculations. Supports recovery-sensitive mode for non-alcoholic options.
Last Updated: 2025-11-15
Version: 1.003.000

### Ships Database
URL: /ships.html
Description: Fleet-wide comparison tool covering 100+ ships across Royal Caribbean, Holland America, and MSC cruise lines. Includes ship specs, inaugural dates, passenger capacity, and dining venues.

### Restaurant & Menu Guide
URL: /restaurants.html
Description: Comprehensive dining venue database with menus, pricing, dress codes, and reservation requirements. Covers 25+ Royal Caribbean venues including specialty dining, complimentary options, and quick-service locations.

### Stateroom Check
URL: /stateroom-check.html
Description: Virtual cabin preview tool with deck plans and stateroom categories.

## Content Philosophy

**Faith Integration:** In the Wake integrates Christian faith perspective into travel writing. Readers will encounter occasional Scripture references, devotional insights, and the tagline "Soli Deo Gloria" (Glory to God Alone). This is authentic to the author's voice and expertise as a pastor.

**Answer-First Approach:** Pages prioritize direct answers before explanatory content. Tools provide immediate value with contextual help available on demand.

**Accessibility First:** All interactive tools include recovery-sensitive modes, screen reader support, keyboard navigation, and high contrast modes.
